title: End the Russia Hoax | Guests: Rep. Jim Jordan & John Solomon | 10/9/20
description:
The FBI thwarted a plot by a militia called the Wolverine Watchmen to kidnap Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer. But while the media’s painting them as radical Trump supporters, Glenn shows a different story. Rep. Jim Jordan discusses why the FBI didn’t act as quickly against Antifa. President Trump claims the DOJ has enough evidence to charge even Obama in the Russia hoax. Journalist John Solomon discusses the latest on the Democrats’ attempts to remove Trump and his new book, “Fallout,” on why Hillary Clinton chose to smear Trump with Russia. College student Grace Sambrano returns for a lesson from Glenn and “Arguing with Socialists” co-author Justin Haskins on what critical theory is and how to argue against it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
